## AddDirectoryOption.remoteDir property

The location where the local directory will be copied to on the remote side.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
remoteDir?: string;
```

## Remarks

This should be a relative path from the current working directory of the remote function. If not specified, it defaults to the `path.basename` of the local directory. For example, if the local directory is `foo/bar`<!-- -->, the default remote directory will be `./bar`<!-- -->. If the directory does not exist, it will be created.
